document.full_text: amazon.com inc will start allowing users of the kindle to borrow e-books from many u.s. public libraries later this year in its latest move to speed the adoption of its electronic reading device.
document.title: amazon to allow library lending of kindle books
lines_and_colors: amazon.com inc will start allowing users of the kindle to borrow e-books from many u.s. public libraries later this year in its latest move to speed the adoption of its electronic reading device.
